misc: Has a habit of getting lost on golf course grounds
Does not spit in the glass
biography: Janne, a familiar face from Revontuli Golf, is known for his generous spirit and peculiar habit of occasionally misplacing himself amidst the verdant landscapes of various golf courses. A true gentleman of the sport, Janne adheres to the age-old adage of never spitting in the glass, showcasing his refined sensibilities both on and off the green.

With seven past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Janne is looking forward to participating in the next event in 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Janne's dedication to the sport and unwavering sportsmanship make him a respected figure among his peers. His eighth appearance is eagerly anticipated.

Those who have had the pleasure of sharing a round with Janne often remark on his infectious enthusiasm and unwavering commitment to fair play. While victory may not always be on his side, Janne's presence undoubtedly enriches the spirit of the game.
